label: ID
description: Index of unique entries

label: Species
description: Species to which the measurement pertains

label: latitude
description: latitude of location where sampled (-90 to 90 deg South to North, wild grown plants only)

label: longitude
description: longitude of location where sampled (-180 to 180 West to East, wild grown plants only)

label: Elev
description: elevation of location where sampled

label: Aa_40
description: Assimilation rate (light saturated) on an area basis at canopy depth corresponding to average light conditions during development of 40 mol m-2 s-1

label: Aa_3
description: Assimilation rate (light saturated) on an area basis at canopy depth corresponding to average light conditions during development of 3 mol m-2 s-1

label: Am_40
description: Assimilation rate (light saturated) on a mass basis at canopy depth corresponding to average light conditions during development of 40 mol m-2 s-1

label: Am_3
description: Assimilation rate (light saturated) on a mass basis at canopy depth corresponding to average light conditions during development of 3 mol m-2 s-1

label: Na_40
description: Nitrogen content on an area basis at canopy depth corresponding to average light conditions during development of 40 mol m-2 s-1

label: Na_3
description: Nitrogen content on an area basis at canopy depth corresponding to average light conditions during development of 3 mol m-2 s-1

label: Nm_40
description: Nitrogen content  on a mass basis at canopy depth corresponding to average light conditions during development of 40 mol m-2 s-1

label: Nm_3
description: Nitrogen content on a mass basis at canopy depth corresponding to average light conditions during development of 3 mol m-2 s-1

label: LMA_40
description: Leaf mass per area at canopy depth corresponding to average light conditions during development of 40 mol m-2 s-1

label: LMA_3
description: Leaf mass per area at canopy depth corresponding to average light conditions during development of 3 mol m-2 s-1

label: Biome
description: Biome classification of the species

label: LifeForm
description: Life form of the species (Tree, Shrub, Grass, Forb)

label: EvgDecid
description: Evergreen or Deciduous

label: C3C4
description: C3 or C4

label: Reference
description: Reference to the original study
